title: Bug splats, data corruptions, and the endless joy of getting a free 5 games ban!
body:
Ok, so I've encountered many issues over my 5 years experience of playing LoL, many. This one's quite something. It's totally affecting the overall quality of the game. Here's how it works:

1- I login into the game
2- Find a match
3- Pick a champ
4- Immediately after "The battle is starting!" and going into the black screen of loading, I get the bugs splat. 
5- Try to reconnect, fail, bug splat again. 
6- Try to Relogin, hoping it'll get fixed. Get corrupted client error.
7- Login with the seemingly "fixed" client after like 5 minutes of waiting (Meanwhile my team is doing a remake vote)
8- Get welcomed by a big pop-up saying that I've got 5 matchmade games of low priority due to AFK behaviour. 
9- Lie down, try not to cry, cry a lot.

This has happened like 3 times to me, in such a short amount of time. Having to wait 20 minutes before each match is a real drag, and losing that hard earned LP as freely as that? No way that can be fun. I've tried reinstalling, changing the OS, etc. Nothing seems to work. Would be great if I and others like me could get a real solution to this, while we wait 100 minutes. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: Got the same issue after last patch. Re-install the game worked for me. I "got away" with only 2  ranked losses and as good as all my LP gone. Afterwards i tried custom games to check if the problem was solved... Still sucks
Might as well go one custom game before every ranked match to check if its working or not. But seriously, it needs to be fixed.

Are you by any chance running the patcher through a pin on your taskbar?  We've been [seeing an issue](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/PINB3ovq-having-issues-patching-615-click-here) with the recent patch where players crash at the loading screen if running from a taskbar pin.

Are those bug splats... bugging you
Use riot's[ bug splat and Crash guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)!
I cannot reinstall the game because whenever I open the installer, kernel stops working. Like if it was working properly before..
im having the exact same problem. Im also getting a heap of low priority queues. Riot needs to fix this
